select.trim: select place_detail.*, place.user_id from place_detail left join place on place_detail.place_num = place.user_id

mapper.insert: insert place_detail(detail_num, place_num, detail_title, default_capa, surcharge) values(detail_num=#{detailNum}, place_num=#{placeNum}, detail_title=#{detailTitle}, default_capa=#{detailPersonNum}, surcharge=#{surcharge});
